special_text:
When this planeswalker enters, if you cast it, you may gain control of target permanent.
[0]: Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked this turn, draw a card and put a loyalty counters on each planeswalker you control.
[-4]: Exchange control of two target nonland permanents with different controllers.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.”
